title: JavaScript Asset Requirements
description: Requirements for JavaScript creative assets. These define the execution environment constraints that the JavaScript must be compatible with.

max_file_size_kb.description: Maximum file size in kilobytes for the JavaScript asset

module_type.description: Required JavaScript module format. 'script' = classic script, 'module' = ES modules, 'iife' = immediately invoked function expression

strict_mode_required.description: Whether the JavaScript must use strict mode

external_resources_allowed.description: Whether the JavaScript can load external resources dynamically

allowed_external_domains.description: List of domains the JavaScript may reference for external resources. Only applicable when external_resources_allowed is true.
